EndSessionConfirm.heading: Are you sure you want to leave?

EscalationForm.subtitle: Would you like to go in the draw to win a staff prize?
EscalationForm.emailPromptFromServer: Please enter your email address so my human colleague can get in touch to help you:
EscalationForm.emailPromptNotFromServer: Please enter your email below to be in to win:

Feedback.heading: How was your chat?
Feedback.howLikelySubtitle: How likely are you to recommend {{avatarName}} to a friend or colleague?
Feedback.howEasySubtitle: How easy was it to get the answers you are looking for?
Feedback.whatsYourImpression: How likely are you to recommend {{avatarName}} to a friend or colleague?

InputProblem.spacebarNotSmallScreen: Press & hold down the spacebar the entire time while you talk to me. Then release the spacebar when you've finished speaking.
InputProblem.spacebarSmallScreen: Push & hold the yellow button the entire time while you talk to me. Then release the button when you've finished speaking.
InputProblem.noInput: I can't hear you. Please check your mic is unmuted

PermissionsRejected.heading: Looks like you've declined permissions
PermissionsRejected.explanation:
We use audio data so that a digital human can understand what you are
          saying to it. For more information, you can read our
PermissionsRejected.noticeNotSafari:
No problem! You can update your browser permissions by clicking
              the padlock icon in the navigation bar and change mic permissions
              to allow access.
PermissionsRejected.noticeSafari:
No problem! You can update your browser permissions and change mic
              permissions to allow access.
PermissionsRejected.noticeText: After youâ€™ve done that hit the reload button below.

PrivacySummary.heading: Data and Privacy
PrivacySummary.text:
We take your privacy seriously, we only use video and audio data so that a
          digital human can understand what you are saying to it. We then share
          audio data with third party service partners who help us with
          transcription. Neither they or we store any audio data once we have
          completed the transcription. For more information read our

AvatarUnavailable.heading: {{avatarName}} is busy
AvatarUnavailable.message: Sorry, {{avatarName}} is on another call right now. Please wait a moment.

Timeout.heading: Are you still there?
Timeout.subtitle: Your session will expire due to inactivity

UnsupportedBrowser.heading: Sorry, your software isn't supported
UnsupportedBrowser.paragraph1: We support Chrome on both Windows 10 and MacOS (High Sierra or later) and Safari on MacOS
UnsupportedBrowser.paragraph2: You could try switching to one of these browsers.
